mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.rawmat_check_sid, t.rawmat_check_code, t.product_season_sid, t.material_sid, t.sku1_sid, t.sample_category, t.check_category, t.check_type, t.quantity, t.vendor_sid, t.supplier_product_code, t.supplier_product_color, t.check_degree, t.is_supplier_check, t.check_batch, t.composition, t.grade, t.safe_category, t.check_standard, t.check_lab_sid, t.iqc, t.report_code, t.result, t.stock_batch, t.pre_rawmat_check_sid, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.product_season_code, t1.product_season_name, t2.material_code, t2.material_name, t3.sku_name, t4.vendor_code, t4.vendor_name, t4.short_name, t5.nick_name as iqc_name, t6.inventory_document_code, t7.nick_name as creator_account_name, t8.nick_name as updater_account_name, t9.nick_name as confirmer_account_name, t10.laboratory_code, t10.laboratory_name from s_qua_rawmat_check t LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t1 ON t1.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t2 ON t2.material_sid = t.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t3 ON t3.sku_sid = t.sku1_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t4 ON t4.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 ON t5.user_name = t.iqc LEFT JOIN s_inv_inventory_document t6 ON t6.inventory_document_sid = t.stock_batch LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t7.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t8 ON t8.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t9 ON t9.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_laboratory t10 ON t10.laboratory_sid = t.check_lab_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_qua_rawmat_check
client_id, rawmat_check_sid, rawmat_check_code, product_season_sid, material_sid, sku1_sid, sample_category, check_category, check_type, quantity, vendor_sid, supplier_product_code, supplier_product_color, check_degree, is_supplier_check, check_batch, composition, grade, safe_category, check_standard, check_lab_sid, iqc, report_code, result, stock_batch, pre_rawmat_check_sid, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.rawmatCheckSid}, #{item.rawmatCheckCode}, #{item.productSeasonSid}, #{item.materialSid}, #{item.sku1Sid}, #{item.sampleCategory}, #{item.checkCategory}, #{item.checkType}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.vendorSid}, #{item.supplierProductCode}, #{item.supplierProductColor}, #{item.checkDegree}, #{item.isSupplierCheck}, #{item.checkBatch}, #{item.composition}, #{item.grade}, #{item.safeCategory}, #{item.checkStandard}, #{item.checkLabSid}, #{item.iqc}, #{item.reportCode}, #{item.result}, #{item.stockBatch}, #{item.preRawmatCheckSid}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
